name: teikei
description: Teikei root monorepo. Teikei is the software that powers ernte-teilen.org, a website that maps out Community-supported Agriculture in Germany.
author: Simon Jockers, Daniel Mack, Tobias Preu√ü, Christian Rijke

scripts.build: yarn install && npx lerna run build
scripts.dev-admin-build: cd node_modules/@crudlio/crudl && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.dev-admin: yarn install && run-p dev-schemas dev-api dev-admin-frontend
scripts.dev: yarn install && run-p dev-api dev-map dev-schemas
scripts.clean: npx lerna clean --yes && npx lerna exec -- rm -rf build && npx lerna exec -- rm -rf lib && rm -rf node_modules

hooks.pre-push: cd admin && yarn lint && cd ../api && yarn lint && cd ../map && yarn lint
